title: Linux gunzip Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the gunzip command in Linux, learn how to decompress gzipped files, and recursively decompress directories with practical examples.

meta.title: Linux gunzip Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the gunzip command in Linux, learn how to decompress gzipped files, and recursively decompress directories with practical examples.
meta.keywords: gunzip, Linux, compression, decompression, gzip, file management, command line

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of gunzip Command

verify.name: Verify the decompression of a gzipped file
